rooms.description: Wide, north-facing entrance with wheelchair-accessible ramp and door. Features are minimalistic design to welcome natural light.
Open-plan living area with integrated kitchen. Spacious design encourages social interaction and includes a central courtyard view.
Contemporary studio bedroom with ample storage, built-in seating, and access to the central courtyard. Designed for relaxation and efficient use of space.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom with grab bars, open layout, and efficient water usage. Includes separate bathing area.
Compact utility closet for storage of household essentials, cleaning supplies, and other utilities.

openings.description: Double door with automatic sensors for accessibility.
Large windowed openings leading to the central courtyard to maximize natural light and ventilation, in accordance with Vastu principles for energy flow.
Sliding glass doors that open towards the courtyard, promoting an indoor-outdoor living experience.
